issue.title: [Python] Missing ampersand in CIpcReadOptions of CFeatherReader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14517](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14517). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
From ARROW-14470: There is a missing ampersand (&) for _CIpcReadOptions_ in _CFeatherReader.Open()_ method found in [libarrow_feather.pxd](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/python/pyarrow/includes/libarrow_feather.pxd#L44). [_IpcReadOptions_ is passed by reference in the C++ API](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/ipc/feather.h#L75).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14517?focusedCommentId=17436135) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11572
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11572>
